title: Track Awesome Phalcon Updates Weekly
_seo_title: Track Awesome Phalcon (phalcon/awesome-phalcon) Updates Weekly - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of awesome Phalcon libraries and resources

items.title: Awesome Phalcon Updates on Dec 25 - Dec 31, 2023
items.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Dec 25 - Dec 31, 2023
items.content_text:
### ODM

*   [phalcon-collection-paginator (⭐2)](https://github.com/angelxmoreno/phalcon-collection-paginator) - A [pagination adapter](https://docs.phalcon.io/3.4/db-pagination#data-adapters) for classes that extend `Phalcon\Mvc\Collection`
items.content_html:
ODM

  • phalcon-collection-paginator (⭐2) - A pagination adapter for classes that extend Phalcon\Mvc\Collection

items.title: Awesome Phalcon Updates on Jul 10 - Jul 16, 2023
items.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Jul 10 - Jul 16, 2023
items.content_text:
### Application Skeleton

*   [PhalconTool (⭐28)](https://github.com/corentin-begne/phalconTool) - Alternative to Phalcon devtools with complete frontend stack without any framework but helpers system allowing to automaticaly bind HTML events using Phalcon 5, PHP 8, Apache, MYSQL, SASS, ES6 and jQuery.
items.content_html:
Application Skeleton

  • PhalconTool (⭐28) - Alternative to Phalcon devtools with complete frontend stack without any framework but helpers system allowing to automaticaly bind HTML events using Phalcon 5, PHP 8, Apache, MYSQL, SASS, ES6 and jQuery.

items.title: Awesome Phalcon Updates on Jun 19 - Jun 25, 2023
items.summary: 6 awesome projects updated on Jun 19 - Jun 25, 2023
items.content_text:

*   [Gab](https://gab.com/phalcon) - Phalcon on Gab
*   [MeWe](https://mewe.com/join-front/phalcon) - Phalcon on MeWe
*   [Phalcon Russian Community Chat](https://app.gitter.im/#/room/#phalcon-rus_chat:gitter.im) - Russian Community Chat in Gitter.im
*   [Telegram](https://t.me/phalcon_news) - Phalcon on Telegram
*   [Twitter](https://twitter.com/phalconphp) - Phalcon on Twitter

### Books / Communities

*   [Phalcon Book (in French)](https://www.editions-eni.fr/livre/phalcon-3-developpez-des-applications-web-complexes-et-performantes-en-php-version-en-ligne-9782409022753) - Phalcon : Develop complex and powerful web applications in PHP
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Phalcon Updates on Apr 15 - Apr 21, 2019
items.summary: 7 awesome projects updated on Apr 15 - Apr 21, 2019
items.content_text:
### Application Skeleton

*   [Webird (⭐97)](https://github.com/perchlabs/webird) - Webird was created to merge the latest PHP and Node.js innovations into a single application stack

### CMS & Blogs

*   [Yona CMS (⭐368)](https://github.com/alexander-torosh/yona-cms) - CMS based on Phalcon Framework with modular structure

### Config

*   [Phalcon Config Loader for Yaml (⭐2)](https://github.com/ienaga/PhalconConfig) - Loads all the yml in the directory of the app/config.

### ORM

*   [phalcon-redis-model (⭐16)](https://github.com/ienaga/RedisPlugin) - redis based ORM and Easy Criteria (The correspondence of MySQL sharding.)

### Provisioning

*   [setupify (⭐3)](https://github.com/perchlabs/setupify) - A collection of bash scripts for provisioning a Zephir and Phalcon based system for deployement or development

### Routing

*   [Phalcon Routing for Yaml (⭐4)](https://github.com/ienaga/PhalconRouter) - Routing can be easily configured with yaml

### E-Books / Communities

*   [Phalcon PDF Documentation](https://buildmedia.readthedocs.org/media/pdf/phalcon-php-framework-documentation/latest/phalcon-php-framework-documentation.pdf) - Phalcon Framework Documentation
items.content_html:
Application Skeleton

  • Webird (⭐97) - Webird was created to merge the latest PHP and Node.js innovations into a single application stack

CMS & Blogs

  • Yona CMS (⭐368) - CMS based on Phalcon Framework with modular structure

Config

  • Phalcon Config Loader for Yaml (⭐2) - Loads all the yml in the directory of the app/config.

ORM

  • phalcon-redis-model (⭐16) - redis based ORM and Easy Criteria (The correspondence of MySQL sharding.)

Provisioning

  • setupify (⭐3) - A collection of bash scripts for provisioning a Zephir and Phalcon based system for deployement or development

Routing

  • Phalcon Routing for Yaml (⭐4) - Routing can be easily configured with yaml

E-Books / Communities

  • Phalcon PDF Documentation - Phalcon Framework Documentation

items.title: Awesome Phalcon Updates on Jul 16 - Jul 22, 2018
items.summary: 10 awesome projects updated on Jul 16 - Jul 22, 2018
items.content_text:
### Application Skeleton

*   [Album O'Rama (⭐85)](https://github.com/phalcon/album-o-rama) - Sample modular application for the Phalcon Framework
*   [Base App (⭐63)](https://github.com/mruz/base-app) - The base application in Phalcon Framework
*   [INVO Application (⭐349)](https://github.com/phalcon/invo) - Sample application for the Phalcon Framework
*   [Vökuró (⭐368)](https://github.com/phalcon/vokuro) - Sample application for Phalcon Framework (Acl, Auth, Security)

### CMS & Blogs

*   [PhalconCMS (⭐153)](https://github.com/KevinJay/PhalconCMS) - A blog built on Phalcon Framework

### Command Line

*   [phalcon-console (⭐9)](https://github.com/viebig/phalcon-console) - Sample bootstraping application for command line applications using the outstanding Phalcon Framework

### Debug

*   [Phalcon Debugbar (⭐163)](https://github.com/snowair/phalcon-debugbar) - Integrates [PHP Debug Bar](http://phpdebugbar.com) with Phalcon Framework

### Miscellaneous

*   [Incubator (⭐726)](https://github.com/phalcon/incubator) - Repository to publish/share/experiment with new adapters, prototypes or functionality that can potentially be incorporated into the Phalcon Framework

### RESTful

*   [PhREST API (⭐29)](https://github.com/phrest/api) - Phalcon Framework REST API Package

### Templating

*   [twig-phalcon (⭐4)](https://github.com/vinyvicente/phalcon-twig) - Twig Template Engine for Phalcon Framework
items.content_html:
Application Skeleton

  • Album O'Rama (⭐85) - Sample modular application for the Phalcon Framework
  • Base App (⭐63) - The base application in Phalcon Framework
  • INVO Application (⭐349) - Sample application for the Phalcon Framework
  • Vökuró (⭐368) - Sample application for Phalcon Framework (Acl, Auth, Security)

CMS & Blogs

  • PhalconCMS (⭐153) - A blog built on Phalcon Framework

Command Line

  • phalcon-console (⭐9) - Sample bootstraping application for command line applications using the outstanding Phalcon Framework

Debug

  • Phalcon Debugbar (⭐163) - Integrates PHP Debug Bar with Phalcon Framework

Miscellaneous

  • Incubator (⭐726) - Repository to publish/share/experiment with new adapters, prototypes or functionality that can potentially be incorporated into the Phalcon Framework

RESTful

  • PhREST API (⭐29) - Phalcon Framework REST API Package

Templating

  • twig-phalcon (⭐4) - Twig Template Engine for Phalcon Framework
